The eroge plays out pretty much the same, and Kyouko leaves her son to be with Shin, occasionally sending him erotic videos of her having sex with Shin. A couple of years later, the son is 18 years old and looks a lot like Shin. By a lot I mean a lot, as in they could be related. Except the son has black hair at this point. So the son grew up well and became handsome.
The son learns that Shin abandoned Kyouko out of boredom and because he got her pregnant, as he had no desire to be a father to their child. Kyouko eventually gave birth to a baby girl, but due to lack of sex she eventually went insane and started abusing her and Shin's daughter. She meets her son again, and due to her insanity actually mistakes her son for being Shin. So the son gets a gun, and shoots his sister (Kyouko's daughter) in the chest right in front of Kyouko, and Kyouko goes "What are you doing?!", still thinking her son is Shin, and her son then shoots Kyouko as well.
